hero.tagline: Multi-industry Drone Solutions – Technology Pioneer – Professional

paragraphs: Hitek Flycam is a brand specializing in multi-industry drone solutions, developed from the technology, human resources, and experience foundation of Hitek Drone – the pioneer in Drone Light Show and aerial performance technology in Vietnam.

Part of Hitek Group JSC, Hitek Flycam expands the mission of Hitek Drone into technical, surveying, logistics, and industrial service fields, aiming to bring drone technology into real-world applications such as daily life, production, and smart management.
